Employee answering the phone didn't speak English. I was unable to place an order.

The waiters and waitresses are rude and too much tip is included. They harass and try to make you order desert and guacamole. The service is horrible and food taste too salty. I am no longer ever going there . They dont know what customer service is. Nasty people. They lost a customer
This has become my new favorite place to eat‚Ä¶ I highly recommend it!! Food is so good and if you want to drink this is the place‚Ä¶ask for a large drink, I dare you‚Ä¶incredible‚Ä¶so good!!!
Good food and a provide a good customers service.
Restaurante catracho todo estuvo delicioso. Las baleadas and pupusas were delicious . Will be coming back for the fried chicken

I have visited 6 Vecinos many times before.  It's sad to say that their food quality is going down.   I was there 3 weeks ago and the water that was served was dirty.  2 weeks ago my husband was served undercooked steak.  All we got was "I'll take this to the kitchen so I can show them."  We were not offered another piece.  I really thought that we were gonna get at least a discount or not be charged for his dish but neither happened.   I therefore left no tip.  I won't be visiting again anytime soon.

I ordered breakfast and pupusas! Unfortunately, I‚Äôm missing food items from the combo. Who ate my bacon? I certainly didn‚Äôt get it and spent almost $50. Secondly, juice wasn‚Äôt secure and spilled in the bag.

Love this place. Have been coming for years and will I bring all my family and friends. Food is always on point and drinks are spectacular!

I had steak and eggs, delicious.!!

You can‚Äôt leave the neighborhood without trying the pupusas and cocktails.

Definitely not cheap. But for Mexican food they're a bit pricey. BEWARE of their alcohol,  if you order if you didn't see their prices.  A sangria medium(with alcohol) I don't know what they mean because sangria already has wine, they don't disclose that if you agree "with alcohol " means it's EXTRA alcohol. A medium sangria costs you 33.00 dollars. A sangria !! . I got very gassy after the meal and I'm very used to Mexican food. So it must be their seasoning or something.  Would I be back? Maybe. But not for a while.
It's been 2 times that I've gone and it's a terrible service, they always make mistakes and take too long to deliver a single order
Great place! Highly recommend

Coming to Seis Vecinos is always a treat! This is a gem in the community that honorsüéñ Central American cuisine, the service is outstanding, too. Come through and support local!
Really great food and even spectacular service. 10/10 reccomend .
Staff was great. The Pina colada was great and the atmosphere was great. High energy and lively

The staff was absolutely incredible. I was with a large group of people and we received nothing but exceptional service. The food was delicious and the atmosphere was lovely. 10/10 will be coming back!
Excellent service!

I love Seis Vecinos!!!
Delicious food! strong drinks and tasty food!
This restaurant exceeded all my expectations. The food was delicious, and the service was outstanding. I will return and bring family members to enjoy the excellent Honduran cuisine.

Amazing food, so much flavor and they took the time to read my special instructions!!! So delicious, my first time trying this dish (fried chicken tajadas) and it did not disappoint! Loved every bite!

I had am amazing time at Seis Vecinos. Shelley was my waitress. She was amazing. The food was fantastic as well. I ordered the Seafood Paella. It was perfectly seasoned and came with a salad . They sung Happy Birthday to me and made me feel‚Ä¶
Ordered a large guacamole and large passion fruit juice to put together accompany some stuff I was gonna make at home 38 bucks I think they are way over priced

Great food! You can get freshly made guacamole right at your table. A wide variety of Latin dishes. During my visit it was a bit loud which caused a problem with one of the orders at my table. The waitress was clearly upset about this, and‚Ä¶

Great first time experience. Very welcoming, favorite part is they make the guacamole fresh right in front of your table. Food was great, drinks are a bit expensive so I'll pass on that. Overall I will be coming back.

Es un excelente lugar para estar en familia y para cenar . Se  pasa fant√°stico y muy relajado. La decoraci√≥n √©s muy hermosa, en general el restaurante es bell√≠simo. La comida √©s s√∫per deliciosa. Los meseros s√≥n sumamente atentos. Les recomiendo visitarlo la pasar√°n divino 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è . GRACIAS POR T√ÅN GRATA BIENVENIDA A S√ö RESTAURANTE ‚ô•Ô∏è. N√≥s vemos pronto ü•∞.

Bueno de la comidad no puedo quejar(gusto) sino de los precios altisimos de cada plato. Subieron los precios exageradamente inlcuso cobran mas de $5 dollares si pagas con tarjeta y tambien propina agregada. No me importa pagar propina por buen servicio pero pagar mas de $5 dolares por pagar el mismo servicio que ya me estan cobrando la propina. Los due√±os estan demasiado glotones y por eso el restaurante ni tan lleno esta como antes. La gente ya ni va como antes por los precios exageradamente altos.

Ordered from here as delivery and dined in before and I enjoyed the food. Their steak is great!! And I also like their cheese pupusas. But I definitely suggest to dine in to get their food fresh and not packaged.

What an amazing experience I had here with my family. Food is authentic, from latin American countries. Must go for their pupusas! Best pupusas I've ever had. I also tried their Honduran tacos and I was very pleased. Tried their Mexican enchilada and wow the flavors were phenomenal. Drinks are are also very good, the tamarindo was my favorite. Service was superb, servers were very attentive and accommodating. Overall was had an A+ experience here!

I‚Äôve read other reviews and I decided to go. Everyone was accurate. The food was phenomenal, excellent customer service and satisfying tasty drinks. Inside was decorated for Halloween/ Fall.
What I didn‚Äôt like : My waitress was trying to up sell. For example, suggestions of extra shot in my drink. I am willing spend money regardless. Please don‚Äôt persuade me.
There was no heat in the restaurant. I had to keep my sweater and coat on while enjoying my dinner.
Overall , I do recommend to bring money and expect to spend it. It is worth it though. I guarantee that

Though I thought they were missing a couple of Central American (guatemala) dishes the food and the service was great. Big portions and good prices. The tortillas were my favorite, they were real made fresh corn tortillas! Would recommend and come back again .
I had pupusas they were delicious. The drinks are good and price is good I will def come back. Service was quick but not rushed. I was there for Mother‚Äôs day and i loved the family environment.

This used to be a great spot to go to. Just went with a friend to catch up and we felt super rushed. To the point that they were taking plates and drinks away prematurely - we were clearly not done and we had to say something. We were in line with the typical time one would expect for a seating (75-90 min) so this was uncalled for. Suffice to say it left a poor taste in our mouths. I would maybe excuse this IF it was near closing time and it was a packed house but it was neither in this case. It sucks when the quality of a place goes down.

The drinks here are super expensive. There is no happy hour. They push dessert on you like it's nobodies business. I asked for a small drink they gave me medium. They are super starve for money in this place. It's ridiculous. This place has a lot of potential. Changes need to be made especially the drink prices. I would love to make this my usual place but there is nothing that makes me want to spend my money here often.

LOVE THIS PLACE!!  My family goes there anytime we are craving Honduran food and they never disappoint .

Service is super friendly and attentive and completely in Spanish (this is the Bronx so why make any pretence of speaking English anyway?) so brush up in your Spanish!

They serve a full menu of Central American dishes. Our family feels the stand out dishes are from Honduras and El Salvador. I would recommend you try these over their Mexican dishes.

They offer mojitos and margaritas in many flavours and honestly you can‚Äôt go wrong.

Absolutely order the guacamole . They will make it at your table to your preference .The baleadas and pupusas are amazing. I
I recommend the tejadas of any kind; it‚Äôs green plantains covered with a cabbage salad and your choice of meat. Trust me ; even those that hate vegetables will finish every bite of these! The soups are amazing , especially the shrimp with coconut milk.

Follow them on instagram if you want temptation !

I've been here several times and now more than ever I feel like it's the right time to write a review. And simply put, it's because this restaurant made me do something I thought I'd never do: eat a whole fish, face and all. And it was absolutely delicious. Previous trips to this Central American and Mexican restaurant located in the South Bronx have included baleadas (a traditional Honduran handmade flour tortilla stuffed with mashed refried beans, crema and crumbled cheese with your choice of protein stuffing), pupusas (a Salvadorian handmade thick corn tortilla stuffed with a savory filling), sopa de marisco (with shrimp and mussels), incredible and hearty fish tacos, tamales and a true standout IMO, their casamiento (Central American mixed rice and beans). I've posted about this spot several times on my Instagram and Facebook pages and if you're looking for a true standout spot in the Bronx make Seis Vecinos the one to go to. Amazing food that'll open your palate up to new and awesome tastes, a great staff and straight up killer drinks, Seis Vecinos is a must visit!

Yes the fresh guac was awesome, the  med. Margarita  was $30 and the drink menu has no prices ü§î the place is nice, yes she was pushing dessert and some shrimp while we had the chips/guac. The delivery guys were busy!

It was my first time trying Honduran food thanks to my boyfriend ‚ò∫Ô∏è We ordered Tajadas but with chicken. However, we got a whole fried chicken. I‚Äôm giving it 3 stars due to the fact that the chicken could‚Äôve been cut into strips or shredded‚Ä¶

Oh how they have stepped it up. Adult drinks and clean menu with expansive selection of foods. Very tasty selection of South American food. The gucamole is made at your table so it's great to chose your items. The ceviche is great and the paella is perfect for 2.

I had a great time at seis vecinos! I had 3 different pupusas... the frijoles y queso, pollo y queso, chicharr√≥n y queso. My favorite were the first two. Our waitress made fresh avocado right by our table which was cool. I had such high‚Ä¶

A total ripoff.  Prices too high for the quality of food and location.  They served us juices from concentrate and stated that they were freshly squeezed.  They also served us the medium size without informing us.  Would never return.

LOVED IT!!! Kept passing by until I went in one day. Tons of space, good music, good food, EXCELLENT drink choices. I'm about to come back with 20 friends! The drinks come in 3 sizes: small, $16; medium (great value) $30, and large, $50.

Great ambient to hangout and have some nice tasty food. The pupusas was delicious definitely would recommend them. Would‚Äôve love to give 5 stars but it took almost two hours to get our food. The waitress was very polite and professional, got our drinks order and granted my cousin couldn‚Äôt make up her mind about what to eat at first and we asked the waitress to give us a minute to decide what to eat. However and an hour went by and the waitress never came back we contemplated leaving because there were customer that came after us and got the food before us. Finally I had to wave one of the waiters to get some attention. The drink were ok nothing too fancy would recommend the pi√±a colada my cousin got a good buzz from it. Overall great spot to hangout and eat the atmosphere is welcoming.

This place is hit or miss. More miss than hit. I‚Äôve ordered food from here a total of 5x. Only hit 2 times. Today was the last straw. Cheese tasted spoiled, food was cold and soggy. $30 in the garbage cause we couldn‚Äôt eat the food. NEVER AGAIN!!
Definitely recommend! Food was good and drinks were good and large (be careful when asked for the size of the drink, the large is the size of the BBQs Bulldog, margarita glass shaped).

Mi experiencia con la comida y tragos muy buena, pero el trato deja mucho qu√© desear. Una se√±ora mayor que trabaja en el lugar ( doy descripci√≥n porque no se su nombre) es muy insistente a la hora de dar el servicio es agobiante, desesperante las veces que viene a la mesa al tal punto que no puedes comer en paz insiste mucho en retirar la bebida y traer mas a la mesa  pr√°cticamente te impone un guacamole de tan insistente , estuve con una persona comiendo la cual por problemas de salud no consume alcohol, fue tanta su insistencia en venderle un trago, que tuvimos que darle explicaciones de porque no pod√≠a tomar ( ins√≥lito me parece ) √©ramos 2 adultos y un ni√±o la cuenta $111 d√≥lares mas tax $120 a lo que la se√±ora le agrego sin mi consentimiento $19.98 de propina el 18% muy abusivo de su parte. Mas $6.04 por pagar con tarjeta haciendo un total de $146.88. Reitero √©ramos dos adultos y un ni√±o.  Desde esa fecha jam√°s volv√≠.

This is a place that I have been dying to try. When I first walked in the host was very nice and courteous. I was guided to my table and given two menus (one food, one drinks).The menu has plenty of food options to choose from. I was torn between the Canoas de pl√°tano and the yuca with chicarr√≥n.  I went with the Canoas de pl√°tano and an arepa with cheese and jalape√±o. I only had a glass of water to drink. The Canoas de pl√°tano was listed as $18 and the arepa was around $3. The food was bland. The pl√°tano was the sweet plantain (which I was even more excited about because I love the sweet plantains being used in savory dishes). I tried adding the pico de gallo to the dish, I tried putting some of the sauces on the meal. Each bite I was disappointed. When I refused a take home container the waitress asked me what didn‚Äôt I like about it, I told her and she was simply said ok and removed it from my table. The other waitress who had taken my order asked if I wanted the check and when she returned she asked why I didn‚Äôt like the food. I simply stated it didn‚Äôt have flavor, she then said that she could have brought me more crema if I needed it and that the food is cooked naturally. She then stood over me while I handed my card, when she returned with the slip for me to sign she stood over me waiting for me to sign. I didn‚Äôt sign until she walked away. Although the service was decent, it was the ending interaction that made me feel uncomfortable. I felt as if I had waisted $22.16 on food that was terrible and I was still hungry.

Had to damn near fight the waiter to make sure we got the right items after insisting to up charge us. Here are the quoted prices: large cocktail=$60, medium cocktail:$35, and a small cup was $16. The large was the size of a Applebees/Dallas BBQ drink. If I‚Äôm wrong, please correct me with the actual quoted prices.

Sept. 2017
Oversized drinks great food and ambience, food was on point,I recommend tierra y mar .

***Edit,  they've cheapen out on everything from service to food,quality and raised prices,haven't and won't be going back *** 2024

Their grande margarita was great and the food was delicious.. this is a secret gem in the bronx for real mexican food. The guacamole is done right in front of you and every server is a pro at it. For the price one cannot go wrong. They also show sports on their t.v's so that was a plus too. Definitely going back.

They can‚Äôt do anything right. I ordered online and literally put the instructions in spanish and they still sent my order all wrong. sent me tacos with no onions or cilantro and put queso all over my food when i asked for none! burrito was soggy and disgusting. GROSSü§Æ

$90 for two drinks? 2 medium and one small.  Insane! You guys have to do better. And start posting your drink prices. We want to support the community we live in but this is pushing us away by completely over charging.

And tip included on the bill bringing our bill to a hefty $240 for apps and 3 drinks. Food is good, and we enjoy it but c‚Äômon. How can anyone afford to dine out when you‚Äôre charging way more than Manhattan prices in the south bronx.
Delicious, fresh Central American and Mexican food, fair prices, nice staff, and service may be a little slow. It's popular for birthdays. Would definitely go back again!

We celebrated our Pastors appreciation dinner! The food was great and staff was so nice! We just moved into our new location for our church Esmirna at 850 E 156st. We will make this our spot after Sunday services!

Big, Bold, Flavorful Breakfasts. ¬†Eggs  Chorizo and tortillas pupusas and picadas for when you‚Äôre really craving something different or close to your heart üè†
Seis Vecinos in the Bronx is a must
